title: Steamtown National Historic Site: Pets
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Basic Information     Pets              Pets       Pets are allowed at Steamtown, but only in certain areas. The parking lot and grassy area to the south of the parking lot are acceptable. Please "curb" your pet. Pets are not allowed in any building, the turntable area, locomotive or railroad car.  Please do not leave your pet unattended in a vehicle or tethered outside. Registered service animals are allowed in all public buildings, railroad cars and locomotives.
